title: C++ Level 5 â€” Arrays & Basic Algorithms
intro: This level introduces 1D arrays and simple operations like traversal, sum, and finding minimum/maximum.
points: Declare and initialize arrays in C++.
Access and update array elements using indices.
Traverse arrays using loops to compute sums and counts.
Find minimum and maximum elements in an array.
Understand the idea of time complexity informally (O(n) for simple traversals).
